item.description:
Happy Mardi Gras! I hope you are not letting the post-blizzard terrain get in the way of your celebration.

I think I speak for everyone who was planning on coming to the Mardi Gras Party last Sunday, that we were disappointed not to make it there. Luckily, Sara has decided that a Post Mardi Gras Party is in order, so, don't lose those dogeared pages and marked passages you were going to read just yet.

If you are new to the group and don't have any context to what I am referring to here, please look up the description of the previous meeting.

Looking forward to the fête gras!

group.name: Classic Books: Book Club for Die-hard Readers

item.name: Post Literary Mardi Gras
